title: Why do experienced climbers die from altitude sickness? What could be done to help prevent people from dying from altitude sickness? - Quora

response.answer_text: Be in top condition, eat well, hydrate well, sleep well helps so much to prevent altitude sickness. But most important, be acclimatized and rested properly. If you are tired (like if it was a whole day walking on deep snow) or you got intoxicated with some food, or cold because strong winds the chances of being weak and vulnerable to Altitude Sickness (Pulmonar edema, cerebral edema) are inmense!
